alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:09PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Benton and western Iowa Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Victor to near Millersburg. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belle Plaine, Luzerne, Ladora and Marengo. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 205 and 214. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
